pr_title: add a step to remind users to not check in tf tmp files

timeline.bodyText: should we just add these to the main .gitignore file instead?

replies.bodyText: It's already there https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/fda-mystudies/blob/develop/.gitignore , but seems not always forked/copied, so just add an additional step to remind users.
replies.author: xingao267
